content: अभिनिविष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Intent on, engrossed in, engaged in or occupied with, applying oneself to; माधवापकारं प्रति अभिनिविष्टा भवामि <ls>Māl. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Firmly or steadily fixed, uncontrollably fixed, steady, attentive, intent; अत्यभिनिविष्टवित्तदर्पस्य <ls>Dk. 29</ls>; <ls>Māl. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Endowed with, possessed of; गुरुभिरभिनिविष्टं (गर्भं) लोकपालानुभावैः <ls>R. 2. 75.</ls> {@--4@} Determined, resolute, persevering. {@--5@} (In a bad sense) Obstinate, perverse; <ls>Śi. 16. 43</ls>; <ls>Ki. 17. 11.</ls> {@--6@} Well-versed or proficient in. --ष्टं Perseverance.
